languages.text: {n}Молодой мужчина в поношенной униформе неловко кланяется.{/n} "Ваша Милость, досточтим{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан! Извольте от лица всего экипажа... и не только... высказаться! Мы к вам пришли, чтобы официально, от всех, так сказать, поблагодарить вас! То, как вы к людям относитесь, уже разнесли по всем закоулкам Простора — от Футфола до самого завалящего мира на другом конце региона. Все славят вашу веру в человеческий дух и добрую волю!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Молодой мужчина в поношенной униформе неловко кланяется.{/n} "Ваша Милость, досточтим{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан! Извольте от лица всего экипажа... и не только... высказаться! Мы к вам пришли, чтобы официально, от всех, так сказать, поблагодарить вас! То, как вы к людям относитесь, уже разнесли по всем закоулкам Простора — от Футфола до самого завалящего мира на другом конце региона. Все славят вашу веру в человеческий дух и добрую волю!"

languages.text: {n}A man in a worn uniform bows awkwardly.{/n} "Your Highness, gracious Lord Captain! Please let me speak on behalf of the whole crew... and everyone... and express our gratitude to you, uh, officially, so to speak! The kind of leader you are, the way you treat people, it's now known in every corner of the Expanse, from Footfall to the poorest, dirtiest, most unremarkable planet. All praise your dedication to the human spirit and good will!"
languages.original_text: {n}Молодой мужчина в поношенной униформе неловко кланяется.{/n} "Ваша Милость, досточтим{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан! Извольте от лица всего экипажа... и не только... высказаться! Мы к вам пришли, чтобы официально, от всех, так сказать, поблагодарить вас! То, как вы к людям относитесь, уже разнесли по всем закоулкам Простора — от Футфола до самого завалящего мира на другом конце региона. Все славят вашу веру в человеческий дух и добрую волю!"

traits.locale_text: {n}A young man in a worn uniform bows awkwardly.{/n} "Your Highness, venerable Lord Captain! Let me speak out on behalf of the crew... and the others! We have come here to express our gratitude to you officially and collectively, so to say! The word about your attitude to people has been spread across every corner of the Expanse, beginning with Footfall and ending with the poorest world on the opposite side of the region. Everyone praises your trust in the spirit of humanity and good will!"

{n}A young man in a worn uniform bows awkwardly.{/n} "Your Highness, venerable Lord Captain! Let me speak out on behalf of the crew... and the others! We have come here to express our gratitude to you officially and collectively, so to say! The word about your attitude to people has been spread across every corner of the Expanse, beginning with Footfall and ending with the poorest world on the opposite side of the region. Everyone praises your trust in the spirit of humanity and good will!"

{n}A young man in a worn uniform bows awkwardly.{/n} "Your Highness, venerable Lord Captain! Let me speak out on behalf of the crew... and everyone! We have come here to express our gratitude to you officially and collectively! Word of your benevolence has spread to every corner of the Expanse, from Footfall to the poorest, most remote world in the region. Everyone praises your spirit of humanity and good will!"

{n}A young man in a worn uniform bows awkwardly.{/n} "Your Highness, venerable Lord Captain! Let me speak out on behalf of the crew... and everyone! We have come here to express our gratitude to you officially and collectively! Word of your benevolence has spread to every corner of the Expanse, from Footfall to the poorest, most remote world in the region. Everyone praises your spirit of humanity and good will!"

{n}A man in a worn uniform bows awkwardly.{/n} "Your Highness, gracious Lord Captain! Please let me speak on behalf of the whole crew... and everyone... and express our gratitude to you, uh, officially, so to speak! The kind of leader you are, the way you treat people, it's now known in every corner of the Expanse, from Footfall to the poorest, dirtiest, most unremarkable planet. All praise your dedication to the human spirit and good will!"

languages.text: {n}一位身着破旧制服的船员笨拙地鞠了一躬。{/n}“我们最最尊敬的舰长大人！请允许我代表船员们……代表大家……说几句话！我们来这里，是为了正式向您表达我们的感激之情！科罗努斯扩区的每个角落，无论是落脚港，还是最贫穷、最偏远的世界，所有人都知道您是个仁慈的人，也都知道您是怎么对待臣民的！每个人都在赞扬您的人道与仁慈统治！”
languages.original_text: {n}A man in a worn uniform bows awkwardly.{/n} "Your Highness, gracious Lord Captain! Please let me speak on behalf of the whole crew... and everyone... and express our gratitude to you, uh, officially, so to speak! The kind of leader you are, the way you treat people, it's now known in every corner of the Expanse, from Footfall to the poorest, dirtiest, most unremarkable planet. All praise your dedication to the human spirit and good will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}一位身着破旧制服的船员笨拙地鞠了一躬。{/n}“我们最最尊敬的舰长大人！请允许我代表船员们……代表大家……说几句话！我们来这里，是为了正式向您表达我们的感激之情！科罗努斯扩区的每个角落，无论是落脚港，还是最贫穷、最偏远的世界，所有人都知道您是个仁慈的人，也都知道您是怎么对待臣民的！每个人都在赞扬您的人道与仁慈统治！”

languages.text: {n}Un homme à l'uniforme usé s'incline maladroitement devant vous.{/n} « Votre Altesse, ô insigne {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! C'est au nom de l'équipage dans son ensemble... et de tous les autres... que je vous exprime... comme qui dirait officiellement notre... euh... notre profonde gratitude ! La bienveillance avec laquelle vous dirigez vos troupes est désormais connue jusque dans les moindres recoins des Étendues, de Castel aux régions les plus défavorisées. Le monde entier admire votre humanité et votre bonté ! »
languages.original_text: {n}A man in a worn uniform bows awkwardly.{/n} "Your Highness, gracious Lord Captain! Please let me speak on behalf of the whole crew... and everyone... and express our gratitude to you, uh, officially, so to speak! The kind of leader you are, the way you treat people, it's now known in every corner of the Expanse, from Footfall to the poorest, dirtiest, most unremarkable planet. All praise your dedication to the human spirit and good will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un homme à l'uniforme usé s'incline maladroitement devant vous.{/n} « Votre Altesse, ô insigne {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! C'est au nom de l'équipage dans son ensemble... et de tous les autres... que je vous exprime... comme qui dirait officiellement notre... euh... notre profonde gratitude ! La bienveillance avec laquelle vous dirigez vos troupes est désormais connue jusque dans les moindres recoins des Étendues, de Castel aux régions les plus défavorisées. Le monde entier admire votre humanité et votre bonté ! »

languages.text: {n}着古した制服を着た男がぎこちなくお辞儀をした。 {/n}「陛下、素晴らしきキロード・キャプテンよ！クルーを代表し、そして皆を代表し、あなたに感謝の言葉を述べさせてください！あなたがどのようなリーダーであるか、どのように人々に接しているか、それは今やエクスパンスのあらゆる場所で知られています。フットフォールから始まり、最も貧しく、最も汚く、最も遠い惑星まで。皆、陛下の人間精神への献身と善意を讃えております！」
languages.original_text: {n}A man in a worn uniform bows awkwardly.{/n} "Your Highness, gracious Lord Captain! Please let me speak on behalf of the whole crew... and everyone... and express our gratitude to you, uh, officially, so to speak! The kind of leader you are, the way you treat people, it's now known in every corner of the Expanse, from Footfall to the poorest, dirtiest, most unremarkable planet. All praise your dedication to the human spirit and good will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}着古した制服を着た男がぎこちなくお辞儀をした。 {/n}「陛下、素晴らしきキロード・キャプテンよ！クルーを代表し、そして皆を代表し、あなたに感謝の言葉を述べさせてください！あなたがどのようなリーダーであるか、どのように人々に接しているか、それは今やエクスパンスのあらゆる場所で知られています。フットフォールから始まり、最も貧しく、最も汚く、最も遠い惑星まで。皆、陛下の人間精神への献身と善意を讃えております！」

languages.text: {n}Un joven con uniforme desgastado te hace una desgarbada reverencia.{/n} «¡Alteza! ¡Ilustre Lord Capitán! Quisiera hablar en nombre de toda la tripulación... y de todos... y darle las gracias, esto... oficialmente, ¡o algo así! Su forma de ser y de tratar a la gente es conocida en todos los rincones de la Extensión, desde Paso hasta el planeta más anodino y sucio. ¡Todos alaban su dedicación al espíritu humano y a la bondad!».
languages.original_text: {n}A man in a worn uniform bows awkwardly.{/n} "Your Highness, gracious Lord Captain! Please let me speak on behalf of the whole crew... and everyone... and express our gratitude to you, uh, officially, so to speak! The kind of leader you are, the way you treat people, it's now known in every corner of the Expanse, from Footfall to the poorest, dirtiest, most unremarkable planet. All praise your dedication to the human spirit and good will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un joven con uniforme desgastado te hace una desgarbada reverencia.{/n} «¡Alteza! ¡Ilustre Lord Capitán! Quisiera hablar en nombre de toda la tripulación... y de todos... y darle las gracias, esto... oficialmente, ¡o algo así! Su forma de ser y de tratar a la gente es conocida en todos los rincones de la Extensión, desde Paso hasta el planeta más anodino y sucio. ¡Todos alaban su dedicación al espíritu humano y a la bondad!».

languages.text: {n}Ein Mann in einer zerschlissenen Uniform verneigt sich ungelenk.{/n} "Euer Hoheit, hochverehrter Lord Captain! Lasst mich im Namen der gesamten Crew sprechen ... und aller ... und unserem Dank Euch gegenüber Ausdruck verleihen, äh, offiziell, so zu sagen! Wie Ihr Eure Untergebenen führt, wie Ihr die Leute behandelt, ist nun in jedem Winkel der Ausdehnung bekannt, von Footfall bis hin zu den ärmsten, schmutzigsten, langweiligsten Planeten. Alle preisen Eure Hingabe dem menschlichen Geist gegenüber und Euren guten Willen!"
languages.original_text: {n}A man in a worn uniform bows awkwardly.{/n} "Your Highness, gracious Lord Captain! Please let me speak on behalf of the whole crew... and everyone... and express our gratitude to you, uh, officially, so to speak! The kind of leader you are, the way you treat people, it's now known in every corner of the Expanse, from Footfall to the poorest, dirtiest, most unremarkable planet. All praise your dedication to the human spirit and good will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Mann in einer zerschlissenen Uniform verneigt sich ungelenk.{/n} "Euer Hoheit, hochverehrter Lord Captain! Lasst mich im Namen der gesamten Crew sprechen ... und aller ... und unserem Dank Euch gegenüber Ausdruck verleihen, äh, offiziell, so zu sagen! Wie Ihr Eure Untergebenen führt, wie Ihr die Leute behandelt, ist nun in jedem Winkel der Ausdehnung bekannt, von Footfall bis hin zu den ärmsten, schmutzigsten, langweiligsten Planeten. Alle preisen Eure Hingabe dem menschlichen Geist gegenüber und Euren guten Willen!"

languages.text: {n}Yıpranmış üniformalı genç adam, seni garip bir şekilde selamlıyor.{/n} "Saygıdeğer Lord Kaptan Hazretleri! Mürettebat ve... Herkes adına konuşmama müsaade edin. Resmî olarak size minnetimizi ifade etmek istiyoruz! Liderliğiniz, insanlara gösterdiğiniz nezaket; Binliman'dan en fakir, iğrenç ve sıradan gezegenlere kadar Enginlik'in her bir köşesinde konuşuluyor. Herkes, insanlığınıza ve yardımseverliğinize hayrandır!"
languages.original_text: {n}A man in a worn uniform bows awkwardly.{/n} "Your Highness, gracious Lord Captain! Please let me speak on behalf of the whole crew... and everyone... and express our gratitude to you, uh, officially, so to speak! The kind of leader you are, the way you treat people, it's now known in every corner of the Expanse, from Footfall to the poorest, dirtiest, most unremarkable planet. All praise your dedication to the human spirit and good will!"
